response: "Why does everyone expect me to be perfect all the time? It's like I can never make a mistake or have a bad day."
"I feel like I'm constantly being judged by others. It's exhausting trying to live up to their unrealistic standards."
"I'm starting to lose sight of who I really am. I'm so focused on being perfect that I don't even know what makes me happy anymore."
"It's so frustrating that society puts so much emphasis on appearance. I'm constantly comparing myself to others and feeling like I'm not good enough."
"I can't escape the pressure to be flawless. It's like there's this constant voice in my head telling me I'm not worthy unless I'm perfect."
